statements: UPDATE car_information SET production_year = 2019 WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry';
UPDATE car_information SET model = 'Mustang', production_year = 2021 WHERE manufacturer = 'Ford';
UPDATE car_information SET production_year = 2020 WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry';
UPDATE car_information SET manufacturer = 'Ford', model = 'Mustang', production_year = 2021 WHERE manufacturer = 'Chevrolet' AND production_year < 2015;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Ford' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET production_year = 2022, model_name = 'Mustang' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Toyota' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET production_year = 2020, model_name = 'Camry' WHERE model_id = 3;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET founding_year = 1940 WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET production_year = 2022, model_name = 'Mustang GT' WHERE model_id = 3;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET founding_year = 2000, manufacturer_name = 'Example Manufacturer' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET production_year = 2022, model_name = 'Example Model' FROM car_manufacturers WHERE car_models.manufacturer_id = car_manufacturers.manufacturer_id AND car_models.model_id = 1;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Toyota' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Ford' WHERE manufacturer_id = 2;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Toyota' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Ford', manufacturer_id = 3;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Toyota' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET model_name = 'Camry', manufacturer_id = 1 WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE car_manufacturers SET manufacturer_name = 'Toyota' WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET manufacturer_id = 3, model_name = 'Corolla' WHERE model_id = 1;
